# performsFirstActionWithFullSwipe

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether a full swipe automatically performs the first action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var performsFirstActionWithFullSwipe: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], a full swipe in the row performs the first action listed in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwipeActionsConfiguration/actions] property. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Getting the swipe action information

- **actions**: The swipe actions.
